answer:
In BC, a public health nurse can determine a vaccine schedule for your children based on their ages now. Contact your local health unit to book appointments. Tell the receptionist it is their first vaccines and you want to get them caught up. 
Learn about the routine vaccines offered to children here. Tips to prepare for a positive immunization experience are posted here. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In BC, a public health nurse can determine a vaccine schedule for your children based on their ages now.

Contact your local health unit to book appointments.
Tell the receptionist it is their first vaccines and you want to get them caught up.

## Learn about the routine vaccines offered to children here.

Tips to prepare for a positive immunization experience are posted here.
Immunization Nurse
question: I have a 3 year old and a 7 year old who haven't had any vaccines. What is the best way for me to get them caught up?
question_variation_0: how to get kids caught up vaccinations
question_variation_1: how to catch up a 7 year old with vaccines
question_variation_2: when should a kid have vaccines
